description: Single storey, part two storey extension to the rear; infill extension above the existing garage, Rear roof extension, and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope and associated internal works.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and supporting documents: Location Plan, SO-119-01 (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Existing Plans), SO-119-02 (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Existing Elevations), SO-119-03 (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Block plan), SO-119-04 Rev B (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Proposed ground Floor), SO-119-05 Rev B (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Proposed First Floor), SO-119-06 Rev C (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Proposed Second Floor), SO-119-08 Rev B (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Proposed Rear Elevation), SO-119-09 Rev B (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Proposed Side Elevation), SO-119-10 Rev B (Proposed Extension & refurbishment Proposed Front Elevation).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
